Table1.News content: Free training resources are available to all California educators to strengthen their remote teaching skills.
Together we can end the pandemic. Learn more about California’s campaign to equitably distribute a safe and effective vaccine to all 58 counties in the state.

To preserve our health care system, the Regional Stay Home Order goes into effect if intensive care unit (ICU) capacity drops below 15% in a region. Counties in the region will be subject to new restrictions.
